description: Try our easy to follow Beef Ribs with Polenta Mash recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Beef ribs,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Beef,High protein,High fibre,Soy free,Tomato,Peanut free
name: Beef Ribs with Polenta Mash Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 332g slow cooked beef ribs in a sweet lightly spiced sauce

recipeInstructions.text: Cook beef ribs according to packet instructions.

Place milk and water in a deep saucepan and place over high heat. Bring mixture to the boil. Slowly add polenta in a steady stream, stirring constantly until mixture comes to the boil. Continue stirring for 5 minutes or until a thick, smooth mixture forms. Stir in butter and parmesan. Season with salt and pepper.
